org.apache.river.test.share

Class DiscoveryServiceUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.test.share.DiscoveryServiceUtil

  • public class DiscoveryServiceUtil
extends Object
    This class contains a set of static methods that provide general-purpose functions related to the use of the lookup discovery service. This utility class is intended to be useful to all categories of tests that wish to use instances of that service.
    See Also:
    LookupDiscoveryService, LookupDiscoveryRegistration

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DiscoveryServiceUtil.BasicEventListener
      Convenience class for handling the events sent by the service with which the client (the test) has registered

    • Method Detail

      • expirationToDuration

        public static long expirationToDuration(long expiration,
                                        long curTime)
        Converts a given absolute expiration time to a time of duration relative to the value of the curTime parameter. Because inaccurracies in the value of the current system time are expected, this method rounds the result to the smallest whole number greater than or equal to the decimal representatin of the computed duration.
        Parameters:
        expiration - the absolute expiration time in milliseconds of the lease whose duration is to be computed
        Returns:
        the relative duration of the lease whose absolute expiration is equal to the value in the expiration parameter; rounded to the next whole number

      • delayMS

        public static void delayMS(long nMS)
        Sleeps for the given number of milliseconds

      • expirationToDuration

        public static long expirationToDuration(long expiration)
        Converts a given absolute expiration time to a time of duration relative to the current system time. Because inaccurracies in the value of the current system time are expected, this method rounds the result to the smallest whole number greater than or equal to the decimal representatin of the computed duration.
        Parameters:
        expiration - the absolute expiration time in milliseconds of the lease whose duration is to be computed
        Returns:
        the relative duration of the lease whose absolute expiration is equal to the value in the expiration parameter; rounded to the next whole number

      • getRegistration

        public static net.jini.discovery.LookupDiscoveryRegistration getRegistration(net.jini.discovery.LookupDiscoveryService proxy,
                                                                             net.jini.core.event.RemoteEventListener listener,
                                                                             String[] groups,
                                                                             net.jini.core.discovery.LookupLocator[] locators,
                                                                             long duration,
                                                                             MarshalledObject handback)
                                                                      throws RemoteException
        Given a proxy to a lookup discovery service, this method is one of a number of overloaded versions that request a registration with the service to which the proxy parameter corresponds. This version of the method contains a fully defined argument list; that is, all other versions of this method ultimately invoke this method.
        Parameters:
        proxy - the proxy object through which the request for registration with the service is made
        listener - the remote event listener with which to register with the service's event mechanism
        groups - String containing the names of the groups containing the lookup services to discover
        locators - array of instances of LookupLocator, where each element of the array corresponds to a specific lookup service to discover
        duration - the number of milliseconds to request for the duration of the lease granted on the requested registration
        handback - the object that will be returned in any events sent by the registration to the listener
        Returns:
        a net.jini.discovery.LookupDiscoveryRegistration instance through which the registered client can manipulate the state of its registration with the service
        Throws:
        RemoteException
